pkgmetadata.longdescription: Call Google's 'Natural Language' API, 'Cloud Translation' API, 'Cloud Speech' API and 'Cloud Text-to-Speech' API // Call 'Google Cloud' machine learning APIs for text and speech tasks. Call the 'Cloud Translation' API https://cloud.google.com/translate for detection and translation of text, the 'Natural Language' API https://cloud.google.com/natural-language to analyse text for sentiment, entities or syntax, the 'Cloud Speech' API https://cloud.google.com/speech-to-text to transcribe sound files to text and the 'Cloud Text-to-Speech' API https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech to turn text into sound files.
